quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First stop, unlock the chest within the cookery. After that, assure that the chest within the cookery is open. After that, recover the passkey from the chest inside the cookery. After that, look and see that the locker is unlocked. Then, ensure that the locker is open. After that, retrieve the keycard from the locker. And then, make sure that the passageway is unlocked with the keycard. Then, open the passageway in the cookery. After that, make an effort to travel east. Okay, and then, take the shadfly that's in the bedchamber. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedchamber. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookery. A normal one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see a chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You see a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a playroom. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a type 4 locker. Classic TextWorld.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The type 4 locker contains [a list of things in the c_2]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The type 4 locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a formless safe. Hmmm... what else, what else?[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cuboid box.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The cuboid box contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The display contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a shower like it isn't some huge deal.

 You can make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type W box in the corner.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type W box contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type W box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a closet. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the parlor.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a workshop, cool, but is it usual? You better believe it is.

 You can see a Microsoft locker.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The Microsoft locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The Microsoft locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge

You're now in the lounge.

 You can see a basket.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

 You see [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] crate nearby.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] What a letdown! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a normal kind of place. That is to say, you're in a chamber.

 You can make out a coffer. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading west.

infos.name: garage

 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading east. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] mahogany door leading north.

infos.name: scullery

 You make out [if c_12 is locked]a locked[else if c_12 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Canadian style safe in the room.[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The Canadian style safe contains [a list of things in the c_12]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out a case.[if c_13 is open and there is something in the c_13] The case contains [a list of things in the c_13].[end if][if c_13 is open and the c_13 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] oak passageway leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden gateway leading east.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You are in a steam room. A standard one.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

 You make out a freezer.[if c_14 is open and there is something in the c_14] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_14].[end if][if c_14 is open and the c_14 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a dish-pit. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] mahogany door leading south. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine hatch leading north.

infos.desc:
You've just walked into a bar.



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] oak passageway leading north. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] pine hatch leading south.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A standard kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a toolbox. You wonder idly who left that here.[if c_15 is open and there is something in the c_15] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_15]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_15 is open and the c_15 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]The stand appears to be empty. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if] You scan the room, seeing an armchair. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the armchair. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

objective: You are now playing a profound game of TextWorld! First of all, unlock the chest. And then, ensure that the chest is open. After that, pick up the passkey from the chest. After that, unlock the locker. After unlocking the locker, assure that the locker is ajar. Then, recover the keycard from the locker within the cookery. After that, unlock the passageway within the cookery. And then, doublecheck that the passageway is open. After you have opened the passageway, try to go east. With that over with, pick up the shadfly from the floor of the bedchamber. Got that? Good!

main_quest.desc: You are now playing a profound game of TextWorld! First of all, unlock the chest. And then, ensure that the chest is open. After that, pick up the passkey from the chest. After that, unlock the locker. After unlocking the locker, assure that the locker is ajar. Then, recover the keycard from the locker within the cookery. After that, unlock the passageway within the cookery. And then, doublecheck that the passageway is open. After you have opened the passageway, try to go east. With that over with, pick up the shadfly from the floor of the bedchamber. Got that? Good!
